unnormalised: My cousin, Rajesh, who works at a brokerage firm, told me that he expects the market to be bullish in the long run. He suggests looking at companies with strong fundamentals and avoiding penny stocks. Plus, consider the brokerage charges, some charge 0.5% per transaction.
